summary: Completed comprehensive testing of visual analytics dashboard with MongoDB integration. All core features working correctly including statistics display, data management, theme toggle, and charts rendering.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 status code instead of 201 for create operations
minor_issues.impact: Cosmetic - functionality works correctly, just wrong HTTP status

passed_tests: Statistics display correct values (Total Income: 11.7M IQD, Total Spending: 9.7M IQD)
Dashboard loads with proper data visualization
Add Spending dialog opens with category dropdown and form fields
Add Income dialog opens with month picker and income fields
Theme toggle switches between dark and light modes
Data Tables tab shows Spendings (380 records) and Income tables
Export buttons present on both data tables
Charts rendering correctly (Income vs Spending, Pie charts, Bar charts)
Delete functionality available for table entries
CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) working on backend
Data persistence in MongoDB working correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix: Update backend create endpoints to return 201 status code instead of 200 for POST /api/spendings and POST /api/income
